channel.title: Free blackletter fonts
channel.description:
There is a German guy who has a ton of blackletter fonts as well as some other fonts... he has been useful when I was making a medieval-type sig about a year ago.
Link: http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/index.htm
